extDescription.message: Live Write CSS onto any page

extBrowserActionName.description: The text shown to the user when they hover over the browser action button.

editorTitle.description: The text shown on the actual editor.

warningOnClose.message: Are you sure you want to do this? All of your changes will be lost.
warningOnClose.description: The warning that is shown to the user if they close the editor with content in it.

optionsHeader.description: The headline at the top of the options page

optionsKeyCommandLabel.message: What key command would you like to use to open the editor?
optionsKeyCommandLabel.description: The label for the key command option

optionsKeyCommandKeys.description: The other keys that need to be pressed to trigger the editor. Always the Command and Shift keys

optionsBoxSizeLabel.message: How big should the editor be when it first opens?
optionsBoxSizeLabel.description: The label for the box size options

optionsWarnLabel.message: Should the editor warn you before closing?
optionsWarnLabel.description: The label for the warning option

optionsSaveLabel.message: Should the editor remember your CSS for a page even when you close it?
optionsSaveLabel.description: The label for the save option

optionsModifyLabel.message: Should the CSS you wrote for a page be remembered and loaded when you visit?
optionsModifyLabel.description: The label for the modify option

optionsSaveButton.description: The text on top of the save button

optionsAlertSaved.description: A notification that the changes have been saved

buttonLabelClose.description: The hover text for the close button

buttonLabelBottom.description: The hover text for the top/bottom position button

buttonLabelLeftRight.description: The hover text for the left/right position button

buttonLabelReset.description: The hover text for the reset box size button

errorChromeURL.message: Live CSS Editor does not work on the Chrome Extensions page. You should try it on a regular website.
errorChromeURL.description: Error message shown to a user when trying to use the extension on a chrome:// URL.

errorFileURL.message: Please allow access to file URLs in the extensions screen and then try again.
errorFileURL.description: Error message shown to a user when trying to use the extension on a file:// URL without permissions.
